channel.title: Posts on Schemes and Notions
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Schemes and Notions

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Welcome to the Schemes and Notions website! I’ll put content here that either doesn’t make sense to be it’s own video, or in suppliment to videos posted on our YouTube Channel. Have something you want to see on the site? Hit me up at info at schemesandnotions dot io. Don’t get too attached to the theme, I’ll likely be swapping it out for something a bit nicer for a blog.
item.content:
Welcome to the Schemes and Notions website! I’ll put content here that either doesn’t make sense to be it’s own video, or in suppliment to videos posted on our YouTube Channel.

Have something you want to see on the site? Hit me up at info at schemesandnotions dot io.

Don’t get too attached to the theme, I’ll likely be swapping it out for something a bit nicer for a blog.
